name: Improveit! 360
overview:
Founded in 2000, improveit! 360 is the brainchild of prominent remodeling industry leaders Brian Leader and Seth Cammeyer – and it was built to provide an innovative, results-driven business management solution to the home improvement industry.

Brian and Seth have a twenty-five year record of successful growth and execution within both the retail home renovation market and the related contractor software market. They are known for their expertise in training professional sales and marketing organizations.

The solution they introduced to the market is based on a very successful internal system that enabled their contracting company – Improveit! Home Remodeling – to achieve double-digit growth virtually every year since the system was implemented. Known for a long track record of success, Improveit! Home Remodeling is Central Ohio’s largest home remodeling company, a Big 50 Remodeler, and the #1 Solutions Provider to the Replacement 100.

They developed the improveit! 360 business management application for remodelers, contractors and home service professionals. It’s uniquely designed to accelerate growth, improve operational efficiencies, reduce costs, and support the success of home improvement companies of all sizes.

improveit! 360 is the only home improvement CRM application built on the Force.com platform, the underlying technology of Salesforce.com, and completely customized for the home improvement industry.

improveit! 360 provides an all-in-one tool to help home pros run their business. With our powerful system they are able to efficiently and effectively manage leads, marketing, appointments, quoting, sales, finance, jobs, service, and so much more.
